website_summaries.verdict: A nicely designed safe that is rugged and easy to hide, but users might prefer other models we tested for a better deal.
pros: It features motorized locking bolts that allows the door to open automatically when activated
cons: Similar to the Stack-On PWS-1522 when it comes to space and features, but more costly

customer_reviews.title: The manufacturers website even says “We provide excellent service”.
customer_reviews.text: Keys don’t work. Called the manufacturer and the phone rang with no answer. They have two phone numbers listed on their website. I called both. I also emailed customer support with no respone. The manufacturers website even says “We provide excellent service”...not really I guess. Would be a nice safe if customer service could make it right. I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: SomeGuy

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, this is not an item that sees frequent ...
customer_reviews.text: The safe itself is well-made. The electronic components not so much. Installed this only to discover that the internal lock/unlock mechanism did NOT work with the keypad. And so far, no amount of therapy has changed that. Fortunately, this is not an item that sees frequent open/close cycles and the external battery pack works just fine. My suggestion, check to make sure the keypad works before installation.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Fox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I rated "easy to install" with 5 stars because I did most of it myself and I am a 74 yr old female. Anyone handy and able bodied could do it. I measured based on size, cut the hole in the wall and inserted to make sure it fit (it is a bit heavy). Had my son drill holes and insert bolts as my small drill couldn't handle the bolt size. After that, done...no touch up or painting at all. It is small but holds what I purchased for. Not fireproof but I also purchased fireproof pouches. Looks very nice, works well. Instructions for changing code, etc are a bit sketchy but, I eventually figured it out. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lvr

customer_reviews.title: I think the hinges are marginal for prying open
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdiness and heft of the safe. I don't like what appears to be very minimal hinge pins. IMO, this should of had robust hinge pins to thwart pry-in's. Why have big chrome locking bolts on the left (opening side), yet flimsy hinge pins on the right? I think its a average product (Chinese made). If there had been another highly rated wall safe with higher security features for more money available, I would have purchased that.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Poor QC
customer_reviews.text: The metal was badly warped on the upper right and lower left corners. Several welds also extended out into the flange. The door was loose when locked. Item returned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk.  Inferior battery compartment
customer_reviews.text: I installed this safe and followed directions to a "T". The interior battery compartment will not hold batteries in place. As a result, the door will not function using the keypad. The springs that connect to the battery terminals are cheap and flimsy and, as a result, do not connect with batteries. The batteries keep popping out of the battery case and thus, the door will not lock shut. I have to use the keys to open and close the door and they aren't the best quality either. If i hadn't already installed the safe I would have returned this pile of junk immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Rock

customer_reviews.title: love it, and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!!! i was looking for a good wall safe but all these boxes had really bad reviews... after several days i came across this one and i’m so glad chose this one... it’s nice and heavy, came in perfect conditions, super fast shipping, and works great!!!! just buy it...
customer_reviews.author: Renteria

customer_reviews.title: Installs easily but just stops working
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in February. I used it 3-4 times per month until June when it suddenly started telling me that my personal code was wrong. It also told me my master code was wrong. No one else has used the safe and only one person knows the code. She agreed that I was using the correct code. There does not appear to be a way to factory reset the safe. I called Protex Safe Co. more than a dozen times and after a certain number of rings, the call just disconnects. No one ever answers. I suggest you avoid this brand for now.
customer_reviews.author: PN

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, poor instructions/spring
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a nice quality product. But the instructions need work. It's not well laid out, in terms of "first time setup" instructions, regarding the lock/keypad, versus the everyday use instructions. Also there's a very inadequate spring that is meant to spring open the door once you've entered the code to open the safe. However, it does not sufficiently spring open the door. I had to put a small piece of tape on the door, which I can pull to open the door after entering the code. Not good, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: J. Orler

customer_reviews.title: The safe is not working
customer_reviews.text: The safe has never worked properly. After being installed by my contractor, the door does not open even when the code is entered correctly. (It says "opened" but the spring does not open the door.) It can only be opened with the key, which specifically says should not be used often. We have been trying to contact protex. While there are two phone numbers listed, they do not EVER answer the phone. We have had an email exchange, but they have not responded in days. This is very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Value for the $$
customer_reviews.text: After spending awhile looking at the $100 equivalents and seeing all the 1 stars.. I decided to up the ante, spend the extra $100 and go for this one. Have zero regrets... Worth the extra $$, no headache, just a simple and sturdy wall safe that works. Glad I didn't pick the $90 one with a bunch of 1 stars and chance a bunch of wasted time and peace of mind. If you're still reading this for advice, do it right the first time.
customer_reviews.author: FreeBird

customer_reviews.title: Unit does not work - web site useless to find answers
customer_reviews.text: Bought his safe, installed it and the locking bars will not extend to lock the safe. Unit says Close then get and error message b-loc but there is no information in the instructions about error codes and nothing on the company web site. Will try to call them tomorrow. Probably have to send it back. Unfortunately, all of these seem to be cheaply made in China. Would gladly pay 2x for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Actual useable interior volume
customer_reviews.text: The mechanical hardware impinges upon the interior of the safe, significantly reducing the available volume. It also prevents storing any sizeable item. Additionally, the spring--so called--doesn't really "spring open" the door. I had to go to the local hardware store and purchase a strong magnet to serve as a handle.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price and easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, 6 hefty lag screws to secure it to wall studs and easy to program. I like the feature if you can't open it after three tries it locks down for 15 min. Has 2 keys if batteries drain, but also has a lo battery indicator on display. Installation was a breeze, fits snug between 2x4 studs spaced 16 in. on center. I think it took less than an hour to install and I measure twice and cut once! Note: Need to use external battery pack to power unit first time to open it.
customer_reviews.author: jimkathi

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty great. Installation was a bit harder for me, since I was on a wall with a 24" stud gap. Had to build it up on each side with two 18" 2x4s, which more or less got me back to a 16" gap. Even then, the included screws were a bit too short (since 2x4's aren't really 2" x 4"), but had some others that did the job. Feel a lot better with this thing than a small safe that can be picked up and carried off.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great concealed safe
customer_reviews.text: This is safe was pretty much what I was looking for. It is easy to install inside a drywall and is flush with the wall so you can conceal with a picture or mirror. Construction seems to be solid, hinges on the inside. Would have been better with two-sided bots though. The manual lock seems somewhat complex enough to resist unskilled picking, but I'm no expert.
customer_reviews.author: TalH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use sturdy safe
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't too bad to install with two people. Cutting the drywall hole was the toughest. Easy to program and use. We use magnet at the back of the 16"x20" picture frame to hide it during the day time. And open to keep the gun accessible at night. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tweety

customer_reviews.title: Safe Safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my daughter-in-law for Christmas and decided I need one too. My husband installed both and had no problems. The size is perfect and quality is very good. It fits flat on the wall and we hung a picture over it. You can't tell there is a safe behind it. I now have my jewelry at home instead of in the safe deposit box at the bank. That was not always convenient when I wanted to wear something special.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: Compared to a competitor that is under $80, this in-wall safe is superior in every aspect. The paint finish, lock hardware, and bolts are high-quality. The felted inside is a bonus and reduces noise. The LED light is convenient. Packaging was well-done. I recommend this product, even considering it’s higher cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to reprogram the code and came with two keys
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty for a relatively inexpensive wall safe. Easy to reprogram the code and came with two keys. What is an excellent feature is that there is the battery compartment in the safe but also came with an external plug in back up battery case should the batteries in the safe go dead. I only wish it was available with the hinge on the left side as well. For my application, it would have been better if the door could swing to the left.
customer_reviews.author: Craig H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall Safe, but TIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Great reasonably priced wall safe. However, maybe due to the construction of my new house it was a bit*h getting it in. It was TIGHT and I needed to take a wood chisel to the 2x4's and an orbital sander to get it to fit between the studs......FYI...
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. For the time I've had this safe it's ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. For the time I've had this safe it's worked as expected. There are times where I might open it 4 to 6 times a week and it opens and closes without hesitation. If you're handy with tools and a tape measure you'll have no issues installing this thing. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Not great
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1) robust in construction 2) good keypad with backup battery and emergency key Cons: 1) door sticks and does not spring open on unlocking 2) locking mechanism takes up about 25% of the available space in the safe itself. Bottom line: unsure if I would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Wall safe
customer_reviews.text: Great wall safe. Easy to install as long as you have the right kind of saw, etc. Programming instructions were a little vague. You have to press the # key after the four digit code when locking. And the door doesn't quite pop out when it unlocks. I had to tape a pull tab on the door...... not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen monahan

customer_reviews.title: Safe is perfect for us and is bigger than what we had ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaces 20 year old smaller self with rotary number dial. This one was taller so it required a minimum amount of work. Chose to have a handyman do it. Amazon will get you an installer for $250 but we only paid $80. Safe is perfect for us and is bigger than what we had before. Easy to set up. Spoke to the folks who installed the original one and they told us they no longer do installs but could order me a digital one (same size as this one that we bought) and it would cost somewhere between $500-1,000!!! We're very please
customer_reviews.author: Steven Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great gun safe!
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. It arrived in less than 24 hours. The packaging was in absolutely perfect condition. No damage or dings. Safe materials and construction are sturdy and stout. Installation is easy. Directions are easy to follow and the electronics work as expected. I would and will absolutely recommend this safe.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Missing key, batteries dead, cant open
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed and batteries are dead so cant open. Also no overide key came with it and no overide battery option to power keypad so i can open. Messaged seller and have had no response. I just need either a key or to know where to get the power overide so i can open and use the safe. So far not happy obviously
customer_reviews.author: daniel stransky

customer_reviews.title: Quality sturdy, dark grey Safe
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Protex wall Safe. Very nice quality. The review is for people who choose black color, its actually a dark grey. It happened to be perfect for us because the wall its going on is dark grey.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Solid product worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid piece. Installation took all of 10 mins with a cardboard template. No issues using entergizer batteries, tossed the stocks in the trash. Probably wouldn't keep the hardened burgalar out, but it will keep things secure from kids/teens/casual thieves. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Looks Very neat installed.
customer_reviews.text: Well built and fairly easy to install. When doing so, cut the sheetrock 1/2" larger than safe height. If mounting between studs.
customer_reviews.author: Coz lover

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - NO CONSUMER SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: Mechanism will fail after one year and the manufacturer does not provide repair or parts. However, they will offer you a discounted price of $10 more than the Amazon price. Horrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: New York Buyer

customer_reviews.title: It works until it doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: We've had our safe for going on 3 years. It usually works well, until it doesn't. It was simple to install. The directions were sufficient. But every once in a while it does something funky. Like today, Hubs got into the safe easily, but when he went to close it, it gave a code "b-lock" then popped open again. We had to play with the safe to get it to lock and stay locked. There's nothing in the manual about b-lock. So your guess is as good as mine. Another time, it decides not to open, even though we had fresh batteries and were entering the right code. Just weird...
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Prefect for small places when you don't have room for a floor safe and not to many hand guns. Great for in closets and can be covered with a poster in the frame. Just remember you will have to use the key to first open safe so you can put in batteries, key come in a separate box and not inside safe like some wall safes I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Initdeeper

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: So far this product has been terrific. Installation was seamless and the locking mechanism works flawlessly. There are three ways to ensure you won't be locked out if you follow the instructions. A little bonus for me is the LED lights that come on after the safe is opened (I didn't remember that as a feature). I used the piano style hinges for my picture that I hid the safe behind and that worked out beautifully as well. Zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: David King

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This looks great installed. We put it between two studs in the wall. It sits flat and even with the rest of the wall. Very nice. Inside has felt on the shelves. It's not huge inside so it won't hold a lot but I didn't need that. Would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: GAD781

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little safe for jewelry
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little safe for jewelry. Mounting it takes a couple of days, as drywall repair and painting are necessary. The safe worked as described, and I like the emergency opening feature, the keys, plug in power supply, and master combination. Now I wish I had purchased a bigger unit.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Positive.

customer_reviews.title: Good solid wall safe
customer_reviews.text: Good solid safe, easy to install if your stud spacing is standard. It's shallow, but there's not much you can do about that, it still holds what I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Sean F. Werle

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Very well made for the price. Easy to install and operate. Electronic locking system works well.
customer_reviews.author: joe figueira

customer_reviews.title: Nice Safe
customer_reviews.text: This safe was installed to store a handgun. It has adequate room for a couple of guns, mags and holster. Keypad works nicely. The safe pops open an inch when code is entered. I installed the safe a little tight and it didn't pop open like it was supposed to. Instead of taking it out and reinstalling, I just cut a small block of wood and drilled a hole and inserted a compression spring against the door. Works fine. More of a problem with my install than the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Good light duty safe
customer_reviews.text: Good light duty safe. electronic combination is easy to use. Interior LED light is a really nice feature. Fits perfectly inside the 2 x 4 wall I put it in. Would require thief to have pry tools to force it open. I believe could be forced open by a strong man with the long crowbar. Reasonable price for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. McNees

customer_reviews.title: Great safe, but tight fit.
customer_reviews.text: Love the safe! Easy to setup and program. Just a warning though, the fit is tight. If the studs in your house aren't exactly 16 inches on center and I mean exactly, it may not fit. I spent about an hour with a hammer and wood chisel taking out about 1/8 if an inch out of each stud. Once it fit, it was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Safe
customer_reviews.text: Well built safe. Simple to install. I like that it came with an external battery pack to openthesafe if internal batteries die.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Meets our needs
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in between the studs. Easy to install. Took 10 minutes or less. Keep in mind that it is wall deep so about the depth of a stack of money 💵
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Had a locksmith install this yesterday. He said "wow, this is a nice safe!" It really is. Operates smoothly, easy to program and I like the two shelves and the soft, velvety lining of the interior. I though the price was good, too!
customer_reviews.author: Chica Chica Chickpea

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Although it arrived late due to a back order, it is just what I was looking for. Very sturdy, fits between the studs, easy for my husband to install (but he is handy). It has two shelves. It is not very deep, so doesn't hold a lot, but was OK for me. Easy to open and close with digital pad. Comes with emergency keys that need to be placed somewhere secure.
customer_reviews.author: Polly S. Munson

customer_reviews.title: Top notch!
customer_reviews.text: We love this safe! Good amount of space inside, easy to install and very nice sturdy quality. I also like the benefit of having dual safety measures in place if the battery should die. There were similar safes at lower prices but I'm very happy we went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Problem
customer_reviews.text: My Installer left to keys and the power pack in the safe and now I can’t open it. It throws error codes. What should I do?
customer_reviews.author: Jim Terry

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great little wall safe! I can tell you it was everything I had hoped for. The installation was very easy, I had it completed in about an hour (I did have to go buy some longer bolts but that was not issue). Great quality, professional look and works great. I am sure if/when we move, I will get another one. I recommend this to anyone that wants a somewhat small safe, my wife and I really enjoy having it.
customer_reviews.author: C&J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, very well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, you need a moderate amount of carpentry skills. If you can use a stud sensor, can cut drywall, know how to use a ratchet set. Very high quality construction device....love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best in wall safe design for the price
customer_reviews.text: This safe is strong, easy to use, padded completely inside, adjustable, very well thought out/designed. Battery and external battery pack to use when internal battery dies, SMART. Easy auto locking/using. Simple, worth the money. GREAT PRODUCT! Jewelry, cash, handguns, etc. It will exceed your expectations
customer_reviews.author: progers102

customer_reviews.title: Wall safe
customer_reviews.text: For a wall safe, it arrived on time, well packaged and in good condition. It was professionally installed it (I could have installed it myself as it was straightforward although the directions were unclear). It was well made with heavy gauge material. The cons are : unclear instructions, no diagrams, no contact email, address or phone. The factory programmed "universal code" cannot not be changed and Amazon did not respond to my request for a contact to change this code.
customer_reviews.author: Lupa Gunt

customer_reviews.title: Nice wall safe
customer_reviews.text: The safe is very large with 2 shelves and keypad works well. There is an LED light that activates when the door is open so you can see the contents. The digits on the keypad are easy to read. It opens automatically after the last digit is entered and closes automatically when you hit the pound key. It is easy to install between 16 inch center wall studs. The lag bolts furnished with the unit are good size. Just cut a hole big enough for the unit, slide it in, and screw in the bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Rand Foster

customer_reviews.title: Well made, concealable, but too large for key case.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to store keys in. Was planning to mount it in the hallway to the garage. It mounts in the wall and can be covered with a picture, or other, to conceal it. It turned out to be way too large for my purposes, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: This safe is perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This safe is perfect for my needs. The electronic code for opening is very reliable and also comes with two backup methods to open in case the batteries go dead. I installed it behind a painting and attached a hinge on the right side of the painting so that I didn't have to take it off the wall everytime I needed to access the safe. Before you cut the drywall to install the safe, take extra time and caution to be sure that you have the correct location that does not interfere with wires or plumbing.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Snow

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with this safe.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this safe at least once a day for 9 months now and so far zero problems. Installation in about an hour. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A perfect safe for small items
customer_reviews.text: The safe is very well built and the finish is perfect. As some of the other reviews indicated there is ample space for hand guns, check books, jewelry, etc. The instructions were excellent. A "qualified" DIY person can install with the proper tools, e.g. a drywall saw and a ratchet. The 2 backup options to open the safe incase of a battery or memory failure are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, like the many lock and unlock features. Was big enough for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: sharonl

customer_reviews.title: Wall safe review
customer_reviews.text: I like this wall safe so well I purchased a second one for another room! Install was a breeze and operation is simple.
customer_reviews.author: Tony R. Triplett

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I chose this wall safe.
customer_reviews.text: Great in wall safe. The button touch keypad is reliable and easy to use. Inside is nicely felt lined and all parts fit nicely together and move smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. We keep our important documents in here. Also both of our dollars. Works fine, and fits in the wall perfectly. Covered with a picture and frame with hinges.
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to install not sure how long it wll last.
customer_reviews.author: george A hall

customer_reviews.title: the real deal
customer_reviews.text: this is what the hotels have! if mounted between 16" center studs this safe is solid. I did a lot of research and I am very very happy with how this is built and how well the keypad and locking mech work. it even has a light in it. Don't waist your money on brands like first alert, read the reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Mojo in CO.

customer_reviews.title: ... installed this in the wall of my bedroom and love the security of the keypad and well as the ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in the wall of my bedroom and love the security of the keypad and well as the strength of the safe
customer_reviews.author: dale

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall Vault.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install between standard 16" joists, and perfect for a behind picture vault.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: The safe is convenient for use, but the electronic ...
customer_reviews.text: The safe is convenient for use, but the electronic keypad stopped working 3 months after I installed it, and only way to open and close the safe is the key now, which is a lot less convenient than the keypad.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sefanov

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wall safe
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Protex Safe, after doing quit a bit of research. This safe offered the best bang for the buck, as I have owned a couple other wall safes in the past. I really like the door pop & LED light feature, which worked right out the chute once it was installed. It took me about 30 min. to install, and it was quite easy to do. I would highly recommend this safe to anyone for a number of different uses.
customer_reviews.author: O-Line Guru

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall safe!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in between the studs, easy to install, good quality and no issues
customer_reviews.author: A. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, great value. Be sure to verify stud location. This safe is for 16" on center.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Roscillo

customer_reviews.title: money well spent
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install and what a great product finally somthing that is as advertised and it looks great as well as being very secure for a home wall safe.The only one to buy
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Love this safe
customer_reviews.text: Love this safe. The reviews were strong. The velvet lining for jewelry is great. There is a light in it which is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Trw3

customer_reviews.title: I haven’t installed it yet, but have it set ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t installed it yet, but have it set up and a code in it. Appears to be ample space for narrow things.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dobalina

customer_reviews.title: Just what i was looking for.... ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what i was looking for.... I had to do a little extra work since my wall studs were 15in on center but it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This safe is awesome. One 2x4 had to be moved over, but not a problem. Followed easy directions. Now the only thing I wish is that there were some jewelry hooks available. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: NANCY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction and easy to install. Fit between two studs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: small but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A little small for the things you would like to protect but sturdy and easy to operate and reasonably priced. I can recommend it for small objects ...like big bills, coins and some jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great safe, one critical flaw
customer_reviews.text: Great safe, one critical flaw. When you close it you can press # and it locks. Or you can enter a code and it CHANGES YOUR CODE. So if your significant other accidentally types in code or mistypes one, you're now locked out of your safe. It doesn't even ask you to enter the code twice. There's no override other than the physical key which we misplaced, so now we have a useless safe.
customer_reviews.author: Howey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and install
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and is good looking as well. Great way to store valuables worry-free.
customer_reviews.author: Mishie

customer_reviews.title: Good for small items but fills up quick
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow interior & not a lot of room. Good for small items but fills up quick. The only positive, easy install.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation and setup!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this myself between two studs. It was a simple installation and required minimal tools. The frame on the safe covered up the rough cut I made. Put your code in, open it up and the battery operated light comes on. The smooth front design makes it great to cover it with your favorite picture. Nobody even knows it's there! The quality isn't the best and I'm sure someone could pry it open if they really wanted to but it suits my needs just fine.
customer_reviews.author: K. Story

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great safe. Sturdily made. Easy installation. Have had my safe for quite a while and no issues with it not working and I frequently use it to retrieve items. The safe is made of heavy-gauge metal and seems very secure. Quite frankly, for the price, I wasn't expecting something this well-built. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: William Hayes

customer_reviews.title: the safe that won't open
customer_reviews.text: finally got around to installing this wall safe .. programming was easy, installation very easy since it was installed in a new construction, but the little spring that's supposed to help pop the door open when you enter your combination is totally crap, if it wasn't for the little screw cap for the manual lock there would be no way to open ... going to have to work out a handle or install a better spring myself ... everything else is fine .... but what good is a safe that won't open?
customer_reviews.author: Sean C.

customer_reviews.title: Use it everyday and love the thing
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday and love the thing. It's made well and work excellent. It's also completely flush to the wall. Keypad works great. No issues what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Best wall safe.  Period.
customer_reviews.text: This wall safe looks really nice once installed, works as described, and leaves nothing to be desired. Keypad is easy to see, buttons are nice and durable feeling. You simple punch in your code and the door opens with an LED light that makes it easy to see what you are looking for. Light turns off after a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P

customer_reviews.title: got it 10 minute and keypad is already stopped working ...
customer_reviews.text: got it 10 minute and keypad is already stopped working will try replacing it one time then Im done with amazon update got my safe to replace the first one where keypad didnt function this one the keypad works but the door does spring open. have to use a magnet like a handle to open the door and suggestions
customer_reviews.author: hk specialist

customer_reviews.title: This brand seemed to be the best fit for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I really researched in-wall safes. This brand seemed to be the best fit for my needs. Very easy to install and I am please with the quality of the safe. If you are looking for a safe to lockup your belongings and don't want to send big $$$'s,...this is a great choice. I would recommend this safe.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nydish

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Easy to install, secure and easy to work.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Egbg

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This safe, easy to install, easy to use and easy to set combination. The safe is sturdy, made great and just what i needed. Yes there is better but based on the price range I got what i expected and very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Wow major price inflation!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. But i purchased this at $123 Now i wanted to buy another since i moved and left mine behind. And it has doubled in price !!!! $250 wow.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge g.

customer_reviews.title: door sticks hard to open
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to easily open this safe, when installed the door sticks so you must pry it open every time you want to use it. It really needs a fold down loop ring to open it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and holds more than you think
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and holds more than you think. Flat against the wall so a picture fits nicely over and no one knows its there.
customer_reviews.author: Lori C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice safe
customer_reviews.text: Quality safe with an easy install. Would order again, but I only need one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install and can be hid in any closet ...
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and can be hid in any closet or even a wall and be covered by a painting or picture
customer_reviews.author: Robert Siembieda

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use. I just wish it had a little more space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and easy to operate. Fits my notebook, wallet and car keys easily.
customer_reviews.author: on line buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall Safe.
customer_reviews.text: Very amazing product here! Easy to install and works to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: jbcalhoun

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and opens and closes easily
customer_reviews.author: harju

customer_reviews.title: Good Security at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: We like it because it seems durable and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Blossom Knoll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for guns
customer_reviews.text: This was the third wall safe we bought. Plan to buy a couple more. Perfect for guns, jewelry - and no one knows it is even there.
customer_reviews.author: Skittles

customer_reviews.title: Great well made wall safe.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wall safe. Comes with a connectable outside battery and key for a hidden lock just in case. You can also program a 4 digit code and a six digit code. Automatic inside light. Shelves flip up flat against back for taller items. Don't hesitate to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice safe, easy to program, good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Steve H.

product_meta.title: Protex PWS-1814E Electronic Keypad Wall Safe, 5.25",Beige
product_meta.description: Color:BeigeThe safest way to store your valuables and important documents is to keep them in your bank's safe deposit box. But this isn't always convenient, especially if you want daily access to your important belongings. A Protex wall safe would then be a good investment. Specially, since you will be storing some of your most valuable belongings in it. Protex wall safes are drilled into your wall, between studs. You can install a Protex wall safe when you are building your home or office, or you can put it in later. All Protex wall safes come with a flange so that you don't need to re-plaster the walls. Wall safes can be opened by electronic lock or biometric lock depending on the PWS-1814E you choose.
feature_bullets: Burglary resistant wall safe with digital Electronic locking system
Motorized locking bolt system will open the door automatically
Designed to be installed between 16" once wall studs
Dual live motorized chrome bolts (3/4" Dia. )
2 removable shelves. Approximately . 44 cubic feet of storage space

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars259 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
